Title: Erratum to: A multi-cohort study of the immune factors associated with M. tuberculosis infection outcomes (Nature, (2018), 560, 7720, (644-648), 10.1038/s41586-018-0439-x)
Abstract: © 2018, Springer Nature Limited.The spelling of author Qianting Yang was corrected; the affiliation of author Stephanus T. Malherbe was corrected; and graphs in Fig. 4b and c were corrected owing to reanalysis of the data into the correct timed intervals.
